original:
Molecular pathological epidemiology is an interdisciplinary field that integrates molecular pathology and epidemiology. This area of study focuses on the molecular mechanisms underlying disease processes and their association with population health.

Molecular pathology is primarily utilized in the diagnosis of various cancers and infectious diseases. It plays a crucial role in identifying malignancies such as melanoma, brainstem glioma
